DOC.brief_title: Safety Study MG1102 Patients With Solid Tumors
DOC.detailed_description: This open-label , Dose Escalation Study , multicenter phase I study evaluate safety tolerability , determine pharmacokinetics , obtain preliminary information regard pharmacodynamics efficacy MG1102 subject solid tumor . Each subject receive dose MG1102 follow 6-day rest period . If initial dose tolerate , subject continue 21 day MG1102 administration ( 5 day treatment , 2 day treatment 3 week . ) Subjects tumor response stable disease , may continue therapy compassionate use . Study Duration : minimum 8 week
